name: Finnish them!
description: This is Finnish them! A unique Tower Defense game which is set in the Continuation Wars. It was developed in one week for the first Jam-Re Vival. Play as the Finnish soldiers, who are trying to protect their homeland. The unique twist: Every soldier has to be micro-managed to maximize efficiency! The normal infantryman may only be rotated, while the ski sniper moves along a line. Molotov Cocktail throwers may only throw when you command them to.
